nodes.text: Torog was a male Houk gladiator who competed in the arena on the planet Besberra sometime before 3643 BBY. Torog fought off waves of wild animals and opponents for an hour before his neck was broken, but the Houk somehow managed to continue fighting for another four hours until he dropped dead. A post-mortem autopsy was conducted on Torog after the fight that determined that his neck had been broken an hour into the fight, and the discovery gained Torog posthumous fame.
Torog was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Houk species in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
